bucket: This chart was initially supposed to calculated the likelieness of AI based on the use of EM dashes in text. However
percent: it was determined that the presence of EM dashes did not significantly correlate with AI-generated text in a meaningful way. Therefore
column4: this chart was repurposed to show the distribution of EM dash usage across the dataset
column5: providing insights into how frequently EM dashes are used in general writing within the analyzed texts.
